Actions.Name: Pilfer Luck
Actions.Description: The [name] marks a foe in range. While marked the foe cannot gain boons, and the [name] gains +1 boon on all its attacks and saves. A foe can end this mark by choosing to roll all attacks and saves with +1 curse for their entire turn. The mark then ends.

Actions.Name: Crow Storm
Actions.Description: The [name] chooses a foe in range. At the end of that foe's next turn, a huge storm of crows descends on their location for a medium blast area effect centered on them. That foe takes 4 damage six times. Reduce this damage once for each other character in the area of effect.

Actions.Name: Bounding Leaps
Actions.Effects: If it lands on an object or adjacent to a character, it can repeat this flight once more.
